price: 惟老弱和妇孺，他们既无力迁移，又不认识道路。
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلۡمُسۡتَضۡعَفِينَ مِنَ ٱلرِّجَالِ وَٱلنِّسَآءِ وَٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنِ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ حِيلَةٗ وَلَا يَهۡتَدُونَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā al-mus'taḍʿafīna mina al-rijāli wal-nisāi wal-wil'dāni lā yastaṭīʿūna ḥīlatan walā yahtadūna sabīlan
